subject: Basketball (College)
Geography
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Because of timing, geography and a caldron of what an N.C.A.A. official deemed “very unusual circumstances,” Dayton played in this year’s tournament in what some said were essentially home games.
snippet: Because of timing, geography and a caldron of what an N.C.A.A. official deemed “very unusual circumstances,” Dayton played in this year’s tournament in what some said were essentially home games.
